title: (x) Sports Group sans type - Inverserif {Mark S}
content:
I’ve seen this before but cannot remember the name. Any ideas?

Thank you.

| --- | --- |
| [sports.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201142800/http:/typophile.com/files/sports.jpg) | 15.61 KB |

 [‹ (x) Racetrack numbers - Clarendon {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201142800/http:/typophile.com/node/12709 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Pottery Barn logo - Corvinus Skyline {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201142800/http:/typophile.com/node/12729 "Go to next forum topic")
author: evan

comments.content: That’s an old display font called Inverserif. I don’t know if it has ever been digitized. (I must confess this is one of my least favorite typefaces of all time. Good luck finding it anyway.)
